title: Auto-advance main hero banner every 5 seconds

requirements.text: Add automatic slide rotation to the main hero banner carousel so the HeroSlider advances to the next banner every 5 seconds and loops back to the first banner after the last banner.

quotes: the main banner should have a 5 second auto times. it should change to next banner after every 5 seconds

acceptanceCriteria: When the homepage hero banner is visible, the slide automatically advances every 5000ms.
After the final slide, the next auto-advance returns to the first slide.
The auto-advance interval is cleaned up on component unmount (no timers continue running after navigation).
If the user has enabled 'prefers-reduced-motion', auto-advance is disabled (the user can still navigate slides manually).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources).
Keep changes scoped to the existing hero carousel implementation (frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSlider.tsx) without introducing new routing or backend dependencies.
nonGoals: Changing slide copy, CTA behavior, or adding/removing slides.
Changing the hero section background or generating new images.
